member.name: T:Backpack.Net.BackpackClient
member.summary: A client for backpack.tf granting access to its APIs.

member.name: M:Backpack.Net.BackpackClient.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Creates a new instance of a .
member.param: Your backpack.tf API key, obtainable from https://backpack.tf/developer/apikey/view .

member.name: M:Backpack.Net.BackpackClient.GetCurrenciesAsync(Backpack.Net.CurrencyValue)
member.summary: Gets information about the currencies used by backpack.tf.
member.param: The type(s) of price values desired to be included in the response.

member.name: M:Backpack.Net.BackpackClient.GetItemPricesAsync(Backpack.Net.CurrencyValue,System.Nullable{System.DateTimeOffset})
member.summary: Gets current price information for all items.
member.param: The type(s) of price values desired to be included in the response.
If set, only items with prices newer than this will be returned.

member.name: M:Backpack.Net.BackpackClient.GetPriceHistoryAsync(System.String,Backpack.Net.Quality,System.Boolean,Backpack.Net.PriceIndex)
member.summary: Gets price history information for an item.
member.param: The name of the item. (Exact match only)
Whether to search for the Craftable or Non-Craftable variant of the item.

member.name: M:Backpack.Net.BackpackClient.GetImpersonatedUsersAsync(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets a list of frequently impersonated users on backpack.tf.
member.param: The limit of users to fetch. Used for pagination.
The number of users to "skip" before fetching. Used for pagination.

member.name: M:Backpack.Net.BackpackClient.GetUsersAsync(System.UInt64[])
member.summary:
Gets various backpack.tf user information.
This method functions correctly but is undocumented and may be removed from the API without warning.

member.name: T:Backpack.Net.BackpackUserFlags
member.summary: Represents flags a can hold on the site.

member.name: F:Backpack.Net.BackpackUserFlags.None
member.summary: If this is the only flag set, this user has no flags set.

member.name: F:Backpack.Net.BackpackUserFlags.BackpackAdmin
member.summary: This user is a backpack.tf admin.

member.name: F:Backpack.Net.BackpackUserFlags.Premium
member.summary: This user currently has backpack.tf Premium.

member.name: F:Backpack.Net.BackpackUserFlags.GroupMember
member.summary: This user is a member of the "Meet the Stats" Steam group.

member.name: F:Backpack.Net.BackpackUserFlags.MarketplaceSeller
member.summary: This user is a seller on marketplace.tf.

member.name: F:Backpack.Net.BackpackUserFlags.Automatic
member.summary: This user has backpack.tf Automatic enabled.

member.name: F:Backpack.Net.BackpackUserFlags.SteamRepAdmin
member.summary: This user is a SteamRep admin.

member.name: F:Backpack.Net.BackpackUserFlags.SteamRepScammer
member.summary: This user is marked as a scammer on SteamRep.

member.name: F:Backpack.Net.BackpackUserFlags.SteamRepCaution
member.summary: This user is marked as "caution" on SteamRep.

member.name: F:Backpack.Net.BackpackUserFlags.SteamEconomyBanned
member.summary: This user has one or more economy bans on Steam.

member.name: F:Backpack.Net.BackpackUserFlags.SteamCommunityBanned
member.summary: This user has one or more community bans on Steam.

member.name: F:Backpack.Net.BackpackUserFlags.SteamVACBanned
member.summary: This user has one or more VAC bans on Steam.

member.name: F:Backpack.Net.BackpackUserFlags.ValveGameBanned
member.summary: This user has one or more game bans on Steam.

member.name: T:Backpack.Net.CurrencyValue
member.summary: Represents additional currency values able to be requested for endpoints which return models.

member.name: F:Backpack.Net.CurrencyValue.None
member.summary: The model will only display its value.

member.name: F:Backpack.Net.CurrencyValue.Raw
member.summary: The model will carry a raw value, which is the value in the lowest currency without rounding.

member.name: F:Backpack.Net.CurrencyValue.RawHigh
member.summary: The model will carry a raw value and raw high value, which is the upper bound of the average value in the lowest currency without rounding.

member.name: F:Backpack.Net.ParticleEffect.ItsASecretToEverybody
member.summary: "It's A Secret To Everybody" Unusual particle effect.

member.summary: "Something Burning This Way Comes" Unusual particle effect.

member.summary: "It's a mystery to everyone" Unusual particle effect.

member.name: F:Backpack.Net.ParticleEffect.ItsAPuzzleToMe
member.summary: "It's a puzzle to me" Unusual particle effect.

member.name: F:Backpack.Net.ParticleEffect.AcidicBubblesOfEnvy
member.summary: "Acidic Bubbles of Envy" Unusual particle effect.

member.summary: "Flammable Bubbles of Attraction" Unusual particle effect.

member.name: F:Backpack.Net.ParticleEffect.PoisonousBubblesOfRegret
member.summary: "Poisonous Bubbles of Regret" Unusual particle effect.

member.name: T:Backpack.Net.Quality
member.summary: Used to define an item's quality in-game.

member.name: F:Backpack.Net.SiteBanType.All
member.summary: This user is banned from all site functionality.

member.name: F:Backpack.Net.SiteBanType.Suggestions
member.summary: This user is banned from making price suggestions.

member.name: F:Backpack.Net.SiteBanType.Comments
member.summary: This user is banned from leaving comments.

member.name: F:Backpack.Net.SiteBanType.Trust
member.summary: This user is banned from leaving trust ratings on users' profiles.

member.name: F:Backpack.Net.SiteBanType.Issues
member.summary: This user is banned from opening issues.

member.name: F:Backpack.Net.SiteBanType.Classifieds
member.summary: This user is banned from creating classified listings.

member.name: F:Backpack.Net.SiteBanType.Customizations
member.summary: This user is banned from profile customizations.

member.name: F:Backpack.Net.SiteBanType.Reports
member.summary: This user is banned from making user reports.

member.name: T:Backpack.Net.BackpackUser
member.summary: Represents an individual user on backpack.tf.

member.name: P:Backpack.Net.BackpackUser.LastOnline
member.summary: The last time this user was online on backpack.tf. Will be if the user has never logged in.

member.name: P:Backpack.Net.BackpackUser.AmountDonated
member.summary: The amount of money, (in $USD) this user has donated.

member.name: P:Backpack.Net.BackpackUser.PremiumMonthsGifted
member.summary: The number of months of backpack.tf Premium this user has gifted to others.

member.name: P:Backpack.Net.BackpackUser.Flags
member.summary: A collection of flags this user has set on the site.

member.name: P:Backpack.Net.BackpackUser.SiteBans
member.summary: A collection of s this user has on the site.

member.name: T:Backpack.Net.BackpackUsers
member.summary: Represents the response returned by the /users/info/v1 endpoint.

member.name: P:Backpack.Net.BackpackUsers.IsSuccess
member.summary: Whether or not the request was successful.

member.name: P:Backpack.Net.BackpackUsers.ErrorMessage
member.summary: If is false, this is error reason explaining why the request failed.

member.name: P:Backpack.Net.BackpackUsers.Reason
member.summary: If is false, this may contain additional error information.

member.name: T:Backpack.Net.Currencies
member.summary: Represents the response returned by the IGetCurrencies endpoint.

member.summary: Whether or not the request was successful.

member.name: P:Backpack.Net.Currencies.ErrorMessage
member.summary: If is false, this is error reason explaining why the request failed.

member.name: P:Backpack.Net.Currencies.Reason
member.summary: If is false, this may contain additional error information.

member.name: P:Backpack.Net.Currencies.Name
member.summary: The name of the game these currencies are for. Normally just "Team Fortress 2".

member.name: P:Backpack.Net.Currencies.Url
member.summary: A URL linking back to https://backpack.tf.

member.name: P:Backpack.Net.Currency.Name
member.summary: The in-game name for this currency.

member.name: P:Backpack.Net.Currency.SingularForm
member.summary: The singular noun form of this currency as displayed for prices.

member.name: P:Backpack.Net.Currency.PluralForm
member.summary: The plural noun form of this currency as displayed for prices.

member.name: P:Backpack.Net.Currency.RoundTo
member.summary: The number of decimal places to round this currency's value to.

member.name: P:Backpack.Net.Currency.IsPriceBlanket
member.summary: Whether or not the currency is a price blanket.

member.name: P:Backpack.Net.Currency.IsCraftable
member.summary: Whether or not this currency is craftable.

member.name: P:Backpack.Net.Currency.DefinitionIndex
member.summary: The item definition index for this currency.

member.summary: Represents a frequently impersonated user on backpack.tf.

member.summary: Represents the response returned by the /IGetUsers/GetImpersonatedUsers endpoint.

member.summary: Whether or not the request was successful.

member.name: P:Backpack.Net.ImpersonatedUsers.ErrorMessage
member.summary: If is false, this is error reason explaining why the request failed.

member.name: P:Backpack.Net.ImpersonatedUsers.Reason
member.summary: If is false, this may contain additional error information.

member.name: P:Backpack.Net.ImpersonatedUsers.Total
member.summary: The total number of impersonated users on backpack.tf. Used for pagination.

member.name: P:Backpack.Net.Inventory.Value
member.summary: This inventory's value, in the lowest currency.

member.summary: The last time this inventory was updated.

member.name: P:Backpack.Net.Inventory.Metal
member.summary: The amount of raw metal (refined) this inventory contains.

member.name: P:Backpack.Net.Inventory.Keys
member.summary: The amount of raw keys this inventory contains.

member.name: P:Backpack.Net.Inventory.UsedSlots
member.summary: The currently used item slots for this inventory.

member.name: P:Backpack.Net.Inventory.TotalSlots
member.summary: The total item slots for this inventory.

member.name: P:Backpack.Net.Item.DefinitionIndexes
member.summary: The item definitions indexes that could represent this particular item.

member.name: P:Backpack.Net.Item.Qualities
member.summary: A mapping of valid qualities to s.

member.name: T:Backpack.Net.ItemPrice
member.summary: Represents a particular collection of s for an item, sorted by craftability.

member.name: T:Backpack.Net.ItemPrices
member.summary: Represents the response returned by the IGetPrices endpoint.

member.name: P:Backpack.Net.ItemPrices.IsSuccess
member.summary: Whether or not the request was successful.

member.name: P:Backpack.Net.ItemPrices.ErrorMessage
member.summary: If is false, this is error reason explaining why the request failed.

member.name: P:Backpack.Net.ItemPrices.Reason
member.summary: If is false, this may contain additional error information.

member.name: P:Backpack.Net.ItemPrices.CurrentTime
member.summary: The timestamp representing when the request was made to the API.

member.name: P:Backpack.Net.ItemPrices.RawUSDValue
member.summary: The value of the lowest currency in USD at the time of this request.

member.name: P:Backpack.Net.ItemPrices.USDCurrency
member.summary: The lowest currency's name used in .

member.name: P:Backpack.Net.ItemPrices.USDCurrencyIndex
member.summary: The definition index of the item referenced in .

member.name: P:Backpack.Net.ItemPrices.Items
member.summary: A mapping of item names to their respective item entries, including their s.

member.name: T:Backpack.Net.Price
member.summary: Represents a model of an item's price.

member.name: P:Backpack.Net.Price.Value
member.summary:
The value of this item, as a multiple of .
If is set, this is the lower bound of the average price of the item.

member.name: P:Backpack.Net.Price.HighValue
member.summary: The upper bound of the average price of the item.

member.name: P:Backpack.Net.Price.RawValue
member.summary: If set, this is the average price of the item in the lowest currency. If is set, this is the lower bound of the average price of the item in the lowest currency.

member.name: P:Backpack.Net.Price.HighRawValue
member.summary: If set, this is the upper bound of the average price of the item in the lowest currency.

member.name: P:Backpack.Net.Price.Currency
member.summary: The type of currency this item's is a multiple of.

member.name: P:Backpack.Net.Price.Difference
member.summary: The difference in price from the previous price entry in the lowest currency.

member.name: P:Backpack.Net.Price.LastUpdate
member.summary: The last time this price entry was updated.

member.name: P:Backpack.Net.Price.IsAustralium
member.summary: Whether or not this price entry is for an Australium weapon.

member.name: T:Backpack.Net.PriceHistory
member.summary: Represents the response returned by the IGetPriceHistory endpoint.

member.summary: Whether or not the request was successful.

member.name: P:Backpack.Net.PriceHistory.ErrorMessage
member.summary: If is false, this is error reason explaining why the request failed.

member.name: P:Backpack.Net.PriceHistory.Reason
member.summary: If is false, this may contain additional error information.

member.name: P:Backpack.Net.PriceHistory.History
member.summary: A collection of s, ordered from newest to oldest.

member.name: T:Backpack.Net.PriceIndex
member.summary: Represents a price index for an item, to distinguish items of the same definition index and .

member.summary: Creates a new (used for most normal items).

member.summary: Creates a new with a specified particle effect.

member.summary: Creates a new with a specified crate series number.

member.summary: Creates a new with a specified definition index for the item it's used for.

member.summary: Creates a new with a specified item definition index and quality as the outputs.

The of the item this chemistry set outputs.

member.name: M:Backpack.Net.PriceIndex.ToString

member.summary: The of the item that this Chemistry set is for.

member.summary: The number of price suggestions this user has had accepted.

member.name: P:Backpack.Net.SiteBan.Reason
member.summary: If set, the reason for this ban.
